text: 'rep roe let health care vote keep getting church time show caption hide caption white house health care vote chances greater white house press secretary sean spicer declined say vote obamacare replacement might happen said chances vote greater greater every day may ap possibility thursday vote repeal replace obamacare rep phil roe r tenn nervous due pre existing condition hes engaged married saturday roe liked many lawmakers expected leave capital thursday week long recess plans air amid plans vote health care thursday vote thursday planned even gets bumped back friday roe vows told cnn chance saturday vote self described unlucky roe feeling anxious could see trainwreck happening two weeks ago told cnn thats buy lottery tickets never bought one im unlucky votes friday ill vote friday ill drive home get home way roe said ill figure get tennessee roe staying positive theres going saturday vote roe told cnn im going wedding saturday '
